scrape__date.description: Date that the scrape of the app was conducted as a UNIX timestamp.

scrape__version.description: Version of the scraper that this data was collected with.

app__developer__name_translated.description: English translation of the developer name, not currently implemented in all scrapers.

app__developer__email.description: Email address of the developing entity.

app__publisher.description: The name of the publishing entity.

app__version_history____release_date.description: Release date of the version stored as a UNIX timestamp.

app__version_history____size.description: Size of the version stored as bytes.

app__name_translated.description: English translation of the app name, not currently implemented in all scrapers.

app__summary_translated.description: English translation of the app summary, not currently implemented in all scrapers.

app__description_translated.description: English translation of the app description, not currently implemented in all scrapers.

app__url.description: URL for the web store page for the app.

app__cost.description: Cost of the application as a float.

app__currency.description: Currency in which the cost of the app is represented, defaults to USD if the app has cost 0.0

app__install_count.description: Number of times the app has been installed on devices.

app__review_count.description: Number of times the application has received a review (both text and star ratings).

app__content_age_rating.description: What age the app is rated for e.g. 13+

app__release_date.description: Original release date of the app as a UNIX timestamp.
